_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four meditators [sn34.3:1.4]: One meditator who is skilled in immersion but not in emerging from it
Another meditator who is skilled in emerging from immersion but not in developing it
Another meditator who is skilled in neither immersion nor emerging from it
Another meditator who is skilled in both immersion and emerging from it.
